The majority of corporate tax cuts have been used on stock buybacks, which benefit wealthy shareholders and company executives‚Äînot workers.

With privacy rights on the line and on the anniversary of the Griswold #SCOTUS decision, I‚Äôm calling on my colleagues in Congress to join me in advocating for more investment in Title X. 

Everyone deserves family planning care. #FundTitleX

Griswold v. Connecticut established the right to privacy 57 years ago.

Protesting CT‚Äôs ban on birth control in 1961, Estelle Griswold & Dr. C. Lee Buxton opened a birth control clinic right here in New Haven ‚Äî one of the most far-reaching revolutions in constitutional history.

Tomorrow, the House will vote on the #ProtectingOurKidsAct, a comprehensive package to address gun violence. 

The package includes my legislation, #EthanLaw, which will keep kids across the country safe by ensuring firearms are safely stored and secured.

Today, I‚Äôm honoring the memory of Ethan Song outside my office in DC. Ethan was a Guilford, CT teenager who died because of an unsecured firearm. He should have never been exposed to this risk. https://t.co/Rhf3BV8S7w

I joined community leaders and advocates in Seymour to urge @FERC to take action and transfer ownership of the dam under terms that are fair to the towns and environmental communities.
¬†
There must be new ownership of the dam. We must protect it.
https://t.co/PHn2NznlmP

For far too long, the Kinneytown Dam in Seymour has been the only barrier to fish migration along the Naugatuck River from Thomaston to the Long Island Sound.
¬†
There must be action.
¬†
We must prioritize the accessibility and cleanliness of our rivers. https://t.co/YDovtu503Z

I joined runners today to raise awareness for gun safety and keeping our kids safe!

#SongStrong https://t.co/W3kPYO7rRl

The food we give to our babies should meet the highest standard of safety. This legislation would ensure we meet that standard, requiring FDA & infant formula manufacturers to do their due diligence to keep safe product on shelves & contaminated product out of our homes.
I am concerned that the FDA‚Äôs guidance and quick review process with limited staff do not do enough to guarantee the safety of imported formula.

I am also requesting that the HHS Office of Inspector General investigate FDA‚Äôs recent guidance of enforcement discretion on the importation of infant formula that may not comply with certain requirements.

Today I am introducing the Keep Infant Formula Safe and on the Shelves Act ‚Äì legislation that will improve food safety, help maintain infant formula supply, and keep workers safe. https://t.co/NPOcIdsiWk

Raymark is one of the largest projects on @EPA's Superfund list!
¬†
The funding will ensure the safety of nearby residences, bring commercial properties back onto the tax rolls, improve storm water management, and redevelop the "Ballfield" to be used as a new Public Works Space. https://t.co/BjSykT8rCo

We celebrated $23 million in funding that has been secured under the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law ‚Äì allotted for the cleanup of the Raymark Superfund Site in Stratford, CT.
¬†
This is a big deal! As we all know, this has been a long time coming for our community. https://t.co/csixsVDb1x

I am thankful to have worked alongside his parents to advocate for legislation that keeps children out of harms way. Together, we're fighting for solutions that will prevent these tragedies from occurring.

The Protecting Our Kids Act includes Ethan's Law, legislation I introduced in the memory of Ethan Song, a teenager from Guilford, CT who accidentally shot himself with an unsecured gun. https://t.co/YPcLT4RYfC

I commend the HHS OIG for accepting my request for an investigation into FDA‚Äôs handling of infant formula safety concerns at an Abbott facility. 

With this investigation, we will get to the bottom of what went wrong & we will not allow anyone to skirt accountability. https://t.co/TI74sh82xi

This crisis needs an urgent response. 

Each day we wait, more lives are at risk.

We face another senseless tragedy in Tulsa. At least 3 innocent lives lost forever due to avoidable gun violence.

We can‚Äôt prioritize the gun lobby‚Äôs greed over innocent lives. Mass shootings cannot be our norm. 

We pay the price for inaction with lives lost.

Ethan‚Äôs Law would set federal standards for safe gun storage, as well as give states incentives to create and implement safe gun storage laws. #EndGunViolence
